pkgmetadata.longdescription: Relational Class Analysis // Relational Class Analysis (RCA) is a method for detecting heterogeneity in attitudinal data. (as described in Goldberg A., 2011, Am. J. Soc, 116(5)) . src/ also contains the source files of igraph-C which was written by Gabor. LAPACK routines are included in the igraph source code.
